name: Enhancement of the original treasures.
description: Strengthen some of the original pendant treasures, including: the Sober Pendant, the Light Pendant, the Lightning Pendant, the Life Pendant, the Holy Pendant, the Freedom Pendant, the Calm Pendant and the Death Pendant.
author: L

chinese.name: 原版宝物加强
chinese.description: 加强原版一些吊坠宝物，包括：清醒挂件、光明挂件、闪电挂件、生命挂件、神圣挂件、自由挂件、冷静挂件、死神挂件。

1.0.0: Strengthen some of the original pendant treasures.
